title: Clash questions
body: If you're the captain of your team on both days, and say the team wins both brackets, do you also get the rewards even though you didn't play or is it just the players only.

replies.body: Also, you can not be apart of 2 clash teams correct?
Last clash, you were able to leave your clash team after your games, and join a different one. Not sure about this one
Yeah nah I'm not doing that. Thanks.
